## ProgramBuilder.defineStruct() method

Defines a structure type

**Signature:**

```typescript
defineStruct(members: PBShaderExp[], structName?: string): ShaderTypeFunc;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  members | [PBShaderExp](doc/markdown/./device.pbshaderexp.md)<!-- -->\[\] | Members of the structure |
|  structName | string | _(Optional)_ Name of the type, if not given, the name will be automatically generated |

**Returns:**

[ShaderTypeFunc](doc/markdown/./device.shadertypefunc.md)

The structure type constructor
